summary: Experienced and safety-focused driver with over 25 years of heavy and light vehicle driving experience. Skilled in transporting passengers and goods safely, conducting vehicle inspections, and maintaining accurate logs. Adaptable, with strong problem-solving skills and a background in electrical installations.
